lead_paragraph: The tale of how the Canadian ambassador and others helped six American Embassy workers escape Iran in 1980 makes a watchable documentary.

headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Our Man in Tehran’ Recounts Iran Hostage Crisis Escape
headline.main: Review: ‘Our Man in Tehran’ Recounts Iran Hostage Crisis Escape

snippet: The tale of how the Canadian ambassador and others helped six American Embassy workers escape Iran in 1980 makes a watchable documentary.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews Drew Taylor and Larry Weinstein documentary film Our Man in Tehran.
